alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 07 at 3:35AM MST until January 08 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Castle Rock, and Limon. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Visibility may be near zero at times resulting in white out conditions. Travel may be treacherous. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
